text: ‘Atahpara tomara mukha phiriye nile'o ami ya saha tomadera kache prerita hayachi, ami to ta tomadera kache paumche diyechi ebam amara raba tomadera theke bhinna kono sampradayake tomadera sthalabhisikta karabena ebam tomara tamra kono ksati sadhana karate parabe na [1]. Niscaya amara raba sabakichura raksanabeksanakari.’
